author: Dileep Devapal
comment: This is the best phone app for wear out there. Hope it improves on the following issues.  Change color or icon of Speaker and Mute buttons when they are enabled. Add contact images for favorites. and sort it in any sensible order. Right now it appears totally random. Add easy navigation option for contact list. I have to scroll to the whole list to get to anyone at the bottom
title: Good app but needs improvement

author: Manh DN
comment: Overall, it is a good and useful app. But these are some probs that need to be improved or changed: 1. Favourite contacts cannot load (or takes too much time to load). 2. Full phone book need a search function. 3. Round keyboard wont work well because touching the edge of every watch is crazy. A rectangle keyboard will be more easier to type.
title: Some suggestions (Moto gen 2)

author: Camaron Villecco
comment: Thank god for developers willing to attempt a smartwatch phone APP but there is room for improvement. By far this is the best app as of today.  Im using a moto 360 paired with galaxy note edge.  PROS: make calls, recent list, contacts list, opens immediately after answering call, better then having nothing. CONS: You must make/answer calls from the watch or the app doesn't open, once phone call is answered the only button that works is end call. Fix for 5 star rating
title: Best app so far but needs improvement

author: James Emerson
comment: This is a very good app, the best phone app available on wear. I have an LG Urbane watch and in comparison to the crappy LG phone app available this is so much better, worth the purchase!  The only additional improvements are firstly the ability to use the watch mic to speak which I know has been mentioned before in other reviews. Secondly, I don't know if i'm asking too much here but since my watch has wifi capability, the ability to connect my headset to the watch directly instead of the phone in case my phone is not in bluetooth range would be the ultimate! Since i can connect my watch to the phone via wifi then could this be possible!? If either of the above two suggestions could be incorporated then definitely 5* plus!

author: Jeremy Caruthers
comment: Works fine on my Gear Live. I agree this should have been a stock app from Google. Its good and usfeful. While it's awesome it enables speakphone on your phone, I think it would be cool if it enabled your watch microphone simultaneously. So you didn't have to worry about speaking to your phone. Still great app and well worth it.
title: Works fine

author: David Taroyan
comment: By far my most used and liked wear app.  The only problem I have is when I make or take a call from my watch,  LG Urbane,  my bluetooth headset doesn't work,  only can talk on phone
title: Awesome!

author: Raul Rivera
comment: This app should have came with the phone. No reason why we aren't able to talk threw our mic and hear out the speakers. Other than that the app is awesome

author: Gregory Thorpe
comment: I agree with one of the other reviewers, who said this should have been part of the core build by Google ... this app is really useful. With a bluetooth headset paired to the phone, no need to get your phone out at all to make or receive calls, it can all be done from the watch. I would personally welcome a traditional dialler layout, and for favourite contacts to be listed alphabetically. But these are personal preferences. The app works great.
title: Great app

author: Toye Johnson
comment: This is a good app Worth not abandoning and holding on to during its developments. Works very well,  it just needs the contact photos, traditional  dialer, contact sequences everyones asking.  Most importantly needs a back/delete button on dialer and log FOR INDIVIDUAL CALL DURATION.  BEST WEAR DIALER OUT THOUGH
title: I like this just needs a few tweaks

author: Peter Pinter
comment: Very good. Especially the function to manage ongoing call (bluetooth, mute).  Space for improvement: 1) mute icon looks almost the same when on or off. Please distinguish! 2) favorite starred contacts might include photos 3) in dialer numbers might highlight when hover/finger hold 4) please put delete button on dialer main screen, not under "press and hold" 5) include search in contacts, at least indexes by first letter. SUMMARY. Still, it's the no1 diapp
title: Good with space for improvement

comment: How do you swipe the dialer away? Mistyped a number and had to restart my watch to re enter the number, making this app next to useless.
title: Lacking, very lacking.

author: Plopis McGlopis
comment: Now the option to hang up call disappears on my lg G watch r so im stuck doing it on my phone
title: Worked well with nexus 5

author: MSBTECH TECH
comment: It is an application that only using hands free of your phone. Not suitable for LG g r

author: Cody Diehl
comment: No way to route the sound to my watch so I don't have to pull out my phone connect to Bluetooth first then close it and call on the watch. My watch pairs fine with my Bluetooth headset. Would be nice to be able to hear the call that way.
title: Great

author: Irfan
comment: please add ability to speak via watch's microphone instead of the phone it would make it easier whilst driving
title: improvement idea

author: Dodjie Lopez
comment: Doesn't work.
title: LG G3 Lollipop plus LG G Watch

author: Paul Felts
comment: This app is a must have for every wear user. To bad it's built in now
title: Must have app

author: Mendy Marcus
comment: I don't normally pay for apps but this is just amazing mostly cuz I don't have to take out my fine to hang up a call
title: This is one app worth paying for

author: Aneudi Word
comment: Its a good app works fine but while using the dialer I notice you can't call out or even save. Besides that apps good
title: Good idea

author: Gonzalo Unzueta
comment: Quería saber si es posible deshabilitar el sistema de llamadas original del wear y usar el suyo para contestar llamadas. Gracias
title: Está muy bueno, casi excelente

author: Matt Longman
comment: Paid money for the mic mute button, extremely unreliable
title: Mute button sucks

author: Enzo de LR
comment: Now THAT is what Google should add to the official Android Wear catalog of apps. It works well, it's simply designed, I love it!
title: Really cool.

author: Philip Levin Slesarev
comment: Current app has round dialer for round watches.Please add dialer for square watches.
title: Nice app just need last feature

author: sophia zeeshan
comment: When I call it dont dissconect or mic bottom is dull I can't click in it plz help fossil q wonder I's the watch

author: Dimitar Tsonov
comment: Not dialing from Favorites, Contacts or Dialer, only dials from Recent... When fix this - 5 stars.
title: LG G Watch R and Nexus 5

author: Muhammad Johar
comment: Can you please add feature to speak through the smartwatch microphone, so that we can use our watches microphone better.
title: Request

author: Tanawin S
comment: Work well!!
title: HTC​One M8 paired with Moto360

author: James Hoon
comment: This app is awesome! This is what Google should have done for Android Wear in the first place... Totally worth it... Thanks man!!! Keep up the good job! 5 STARS!!!
title: Awesome!

author: Bryan Lowe
comment: So far so good on Asus Zen.
title: Works with ZenWatch

author: Chris Beger
comment: No way to exit the app on the OG LG G Watch when in the dialer.
title: Large Bug

author: Anas Dalbah
comment: The icons aren't really in the middle of each circle but that's irrelevant the app is great and works great
title: Moto 360

author: David Titik
comment: Must have app for gear.
title: Must have

author: Ramon A. Martinez
comment: Fully recommended... very funtionaly and work really fine.
title: Awsome App!!

author: Eric Taylor
comment: great functionality, works well

author: Brittany Caldwell
comment: I love it.
title: Awesome

author: Carlos Jaramillo
comment: Great app
title: Good

author: Johnathon Johnson
comment: Great app

author: Justin Footer
comment: This app worked great but when ever I would use it my m8 would make a loud annoying buzzing sound and that sounds broke the bottom speaker of my phone
title: Worst app ever

author: Igor Stefanovic
comment: On LG G Watch-R buttons on the first screen are too close to each other and little bigger then it is necessary. Other then that it is simple and effective app.
title: Nice app

author: ronaldo Android
comment: A few features don't work, when fixed 5 stars. I have a moto360 and HTC one m7 gpe, favourite contacts mute and speakerphone functions don't work
title: Almost there
